europeana:record.dc:title: Die Gattung Neopisosoma Haig, 1960 im tropischen Westatlantik, mit der Beschreibung von Neopisosoma neglectum spec. nov. und Neopisosoma orientale spec. nov. (Crustacea: Anomura: Porcellanidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Werding B.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Crustacea Decapoda; Porcellanidae; Neopisosoma; description; distribution; status of the genus; tropical western Atlantic
europeana:record.dc:description: Neopisosoma angustifrons (Benedict, 1901) and N. curacaoense (Schmitt, 1924) are described; for both species an extension of range is reported. N. neglectum spec. nov. from Colombia and the Lesser Antilles and N. orientale spec. nov. from Trinidad are described. The status of Neopisosoma as a distinct genus probably will have to be reconsidered.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Die Gattung Neopisosoma Haig, 1960 im tropischen Westatlantik, mit der Beschreibung von Neopisosoma neglectum spec. nov. und Neopisosoma orientale spec. nov. (Crustacea: Anomura: Porcellanidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 60) (Issue 11)
